jewelry.name: Health nut girl (doing a bridge stretch)

aquarius.name: Aquarius
aquarius.description: An open-ended man’s bracelet with heat tints came into being thanks to the order of an important person to me. For a long time I was sculpting to find the proper shape. Then I took my mind off things, pouring melted wax on a glass surface. I wondered what kind of ornament I could make this way. Fluidity of hot wax guided me. I followed my intuition, and on a sudden, I got the right result.

n&s.name: N&S
n&s.description: N&S - natural and stainless - are jewelry pieces narrating contrast of future. This is the world full of the items, which combine softness of shape with hardness of material, rough surface and high tenacity with durability, streamline form and movability with dimensional and corrosion stability. This is the place where a human being is surrounded by personalized and human-friendly goods. Rings “N&S” are made of the material which possess above-listed qualities.

intellectual_and_stylish.name: Intellectual and stylish
intellectual_and_stylish.description: Once conversationally, my art colleague and I were discussing who we created our works for. Esteeming combination of beauty and esprit, I realized that it could be a lady. I call her Intellectual and Stylish.

all_my_love.name: All my love
all_my_love.description: Heart-shaped rings are jewelry classic long since. The explanation of symbol varies in different periods and cultures. In this particular case, the signet and its pair express my attitude to jewelry art and my handicraft.

maki.name: Poppy
maki.description: These earrings are my narrative for the glory of the nature. Non-symmetric poppyheads resemble a couple and depict yin-yang.

health_nut_girl.name: Health nut girl (doing a bridge stretch)
health_nut_girl.description: The health nut girl is a collective image of a Saint-Petersburg’s historic downtown citizen. There is the atmosphere of white nights, leaf bridges, soviet carpets, prerevolution parquet floor, morning yoga, coffee and sweets.

rosemary.name: Rosemary
rosemary.description: «Dew of the Sea» is one of the translations of this word. The poetical figure of this coniferous plant is fraught with many aspects: a beautiful shape, a harmonious name, gingery smell, the warmth of the sea.
